column4: hi! id' like to install ubuntu in a few days, however with upcoming release of 8.04 i'd like to ask if it's better to install 7.10 and dist-updgrade or do the same bur with 8.04b ?
so you say it's better to install 7.10 and later on dist-upgrade?
is this the first time you will be installing ubuntu?
it's probably best to install gutsy or beta and do a fresh install when hardy is released
